meanings.definition: To depict or represent in a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: She was portraying a beautiful sunset in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The artist was portraying a scene from a famous novel.
meanings.sent3: The painting portraying a talking cat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her brushstrokes were portraying emotions as vivid as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The author's words were portraying a magical world beyond imagination.

meanings.definition: To describe or represent in words.
meanings.sent1: He was portraying his feelings through poetry.
meanings.sent2: The journalist was portraying the events of the day in his article.
meanings.sent3: The speech portraying a dancing elephant was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was portraying life's complexities with clarity.
meanings.sent5: The lyrics were portraying a love so deep it touched the soul.

meanings.definition: To act the part of a character in a play or movie.
meanings.sent1: She was portraying the role of a brave princess on stage.
meanings.sent2: The actor was portraying a detective in the film.
meanings.sent3: His portrayal of a clumsy waiter had the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: The actress was portraying a villain with such intensity.
meanings.sent5: The young actor was portraying a hero with courage and conviction.
